full_text:
Re: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update
From
To
Shirley V. Skipper-Scott
Date
2019/07/28 08:58
Subject:
Re: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update
Attachments:
TEXT.htm
Thanks!
I'll let the Lt.s' know to move him.
>>> Shirley V. Skipper-Scott
@bop.gov> 7/28/2019 8:56 AM >>>
Can you not just move him to another cell? He will not have lunch in Attorney Conference. He will go back to his cell to eat. He knows this.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
-------- Original message --------
From:
@bop.gov>
Date: 7/28/19 8:52 AM (GMT-05:00)
To: "Shirley V. Skipper-Scott"
@bop.gov>
Cc:
@bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update
>>> 
07/28/2019 08:52 >>>
He also complained that he is in Attorney Conference from about 8 AM to about 8 PM each day and he said yesterday he only received one meal, a sandwich at about 4:15 PM. He said he should be getting lunch and dinner.
Also additional information on the toilet that reportedly flushed for 45 minutes. He stated to avoid the toilet from doing that again because he stated he found it so aversive and disorienting, he has been urinating in a cup. I already sent an e-mail to
about the toilet.
>>> Shirley V. Skipper-Scott
@bop.gov> 7/28/2019 7:51 AM >>>
Good morning,
Thank you.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
-------- Original message --------
From:
@bop.gov>
Date: 7/28/19 7:49 AM (GMT-05:00)
To: "Shirley V. Skinner-Scott"
@bop.gov>
Page 9527

additional_notes: The document is an email chain discussing a prisoner's conditions and movements. The emails are heavily redacted, obscuring names and email addresses. The document appears to be a photocopy or scan of an electronic document, with clear text and formatting.
